conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway with wall height/thickness and an angled view; however, the modeled layout is not a faithful transformation of the provided 2D plan.

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are missing in the 3D render (e.g., living/dining, kitchen/utility/foyer/servant, multiple bedrooms/toilets, balconies).
Overall layout topology and adjacency relationships do not match the 2D plan; the 3D model appears to be a different simplified floor plan.

summary: Although the second image is genuinely 3D, it does not represent the provided 2D floor plan and omits the majority of required rooms/spaces.
